title: Is this Cyrillic OK?
content:
Is there anything wrong with the design of these characters?  
Any feedback welcome.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154355im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rolcaps_5273.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154355im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Rollc_6018.png)
author: Nick Cooke

comments.content: Very odd П, г, н, ь, ъ & I don't really like Л, ы, у. The Serbian letters are incorrect. Because it's a script, it must either have Serbian cursive alternates for г, п, т, ш or have no Serbian glyphs at all, just not to confuse people.

Hi Dmitry. Thanks for your feedback.

I posted this on the general discussions forum also to try to get as much feedback as possible, so that I can progress with this job.  
I gave some feedback here: [http://typophile.com/node/121098](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154355/http:/typophile.com/node/121098 "http://typophile.com/node/121098")  
When you say you don't really like Л, ы, у do you mean they are incorrect?  
Do you have any examples of the Serbian cursive alternates for г, п, т, ш that show how they should be?

The letters in the initial post are from MacOS Cyrillic codepages.
